sentences.en: Insularity and self - containment, it is argued, go hand in hand.
sentences.cn: 他们争论说, 心胸狭窄和 自我 封闭是并存的.

sentences.en: Their approaches to last Saturday night's 100 m races were similar only in insularity.
sentences.cn: 他们上周六晚100米赛跑的备战策略大体相同。

sentences.en: Their approaches to last Saturday night's 100 m races were similar only in this insularity.
sentences.cn: 他们上周六晚100米赛跑的备战策略大体相同.

words.tran_cn: 孤立的；与世隔绝的；海岛的；岛民的
（思想、观点等）偏狭，性僵化；岛国性质（或状态）；岛屿生活状况，与外界隔绝的生活状况

trans.tran_cn: 岛国，孤立，偏狭，岛国根性
